Text: I didn't download this torrent, but I did get this from another torrent.  It's got Lexicon's name all over it, but it most certainly does not sound even close to the hardware.

Works perfectly in Cubase and Reaper. 
Sounds incredably sexy too :P

THANKS!!

search for Lexicon.PCM.Native.Reverb.Plug-In.Bundle.VST.RTAS.v1.0.4. 

bigger, complete download. 

cheers beers big ears!
